description:
nova.compute.manager throws exception.Error.
This is not informative, so the manager should raise more specific exception.
title: nova.compute.manager throws invalid Error

comments.content:
nova.compute.manager throws exception.Error.

comments.content: Looks like there are 4 cases where nova.compute.manager.ComputeManager raises nova.exception.Error. Those still need to be addressed. Jay, any update on this?

comments.content: It looks like this has been fixed.  I don't see that in the compute manager in the latest code.
